thread.section_title: Villa Beaumarchais - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend break
thread.title_full: Weekend break - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: claire_box21
title: Weekend break
text: Nice little back Street hotel. Breakfast was nothing special & could be improved but could not fault the staff, very friendly & most helpful, room was a little on small side for price & a little shabby but the most comfortable bed I've slept in with crisp cotton bedding. Would defiantly be staying again very soon
